name: MOMO.EXE 2
description: You have to make a deal with Momo to do the work for the boss. What will Momo ask in return?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (x64) Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
